examples: He comes of a worker's family.
The worker bee is neuter.
She is a very responsible worker.
The worker was dismissed for laziness.
The company is planning to hire 200 workers.
That new employee is really a hard worker.
He is a quick worker and good communicator.
He is a careless worker.
They are both hard workers.
She certainly is a hard worker.
Each worker receives an annual bonus.
He is retraining to become an IT worker.
a well deserved promotion for a hard worker
She established a reputation as a hard worker.
He is an industrious worker.
an industrious worker who never seems to sleep
The average worker earned $1,000 more this year.
She has always been a very conscientious worker.
He's a hard worker but he's not very intelligent.
The average worker takes home around $300 a week.
She's proved herself to be a very reliable worker.
She's a very hard worker and very eager to please.
Whilst a good worker, he's not a very good manager.
Don't be misled by appearances, he's a good worker.
She's a hard worker but she's no great intellectual.
new health and safety regulations for factory workers
an injured worker forced to live on invalidity benefit
The ardency in the social worker's voice surprised me.
He has a well-deserved reputation as a reliable worker.
His job combines the functions of a manager and a worker.
